sentences.en: A soldier might unfurl a sheet of plastic showing a real - time situation map.
sentences.cn: 士兵可以摊开一块塑胶,上面显示了即时的战情地图.

sentences.en: Fond memories unfurl from the foot of Nanshan!
Once outside the inner breakwater, we began to unfurl all the sails.
sentences.cn: 一驶出内防波堤，我们就扬起了所有的船帆。

sentences.en: The exposition will unfurl 2008 Olympic Landscape Sculpture Designs Contest Selected Artworks Exhibition.
sentences.cn: 2008奥运景观雕塑方案征集大赛入选艺术精品展.

sentences.en: Unfurl the banners, put on your armour. Let the fighting commence.
sentences.cn: 展开旗帜, 穿上战甲,开始战斗.

sentences.en: You can then unfurl them on train or switch over to the newspaper.
sentences.cn: 然后你可以打着他们在列车上或改用报纸的.

trans.tran_cn: 展开, 展示, 公开, 使旗招展
trans.tran_en: if a flag, sail etc unfurls, or if someone unfurls it, it unrolls and opens

trans.tran_cn: 展开，张开，铺开（某物），公开，揭示
